summary: Air Force General - strategic bombing architect, alleged UAP encounter witness, nuclear hardliner
key_facts: Led WWII firebombing of Japan (Tokyo: 100,000+ dead)
Strategic Air Command chief (1948-1957) - nuclear war planning
Alleged witness to UAP incidents at Air Force bases
Cuban Missile Crisis hawk - advocated nuclear first strike
1968 VP candidate with George Wallace (segregationist ticket)
concealment: Military classification of UAP incidents, nuclear command authority secrecy
